verses.verse: When thou goest forth <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against thine enemies <S%H341><s%>, and seest <S%H7200><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%>, and chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and a people <S%H5971><s%> more <S%H7227><s%> than thou <S%H3372><s%>, thou shalt not be afraid of them <S%H3068><s%>; for Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> is with thee <S%H5927><s%>, who brought thee up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
And it shall be <S%H7126><s%>, when ye draw nigh unto the battle <S%H4421><s%>, that the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall approach <S%H5066><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>,

and shall say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8085><s%>, Hear, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, ye draw nigh <S%H7131><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> unto battle <S%H4421><s%> against your enemies <S%H341><s%>: let not your heart <S%H3824><s%> faint <S%H7401><s%>; fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H2648><s%>, nor tremble, neither be ye affrighted <S%H6206><s%> at them <S%H6440><s%>;
for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is he that goeth <S%H1980><s%> with you <S%H3898><s%>, to fight for you against your enemies <S%H341><s%>, to save you <S%H3467><s%>.

And the officers <S%H7860><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What man <S%H376><s%> is there that hath built <S%H1129><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and hath not dedicated <S%H2596><s%> it <S%H3212><s%>? let him go and return <S%H7725><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%>, lest he die <S%H4191><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> dedicate it <S%H2596><s%>.

And what man <S%H376><s%> is there that hath planted <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, and hath not used <S%H2490><s%> the fruit thereof <S%H3212><s%>? let him go and return <S%H7725><s%> unto his house <S%H1004><s%>, lest he die <S%H4191><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> use the fruit thereof <S%H2490><s%>.

And what man <S%H376><s%> is there that hath betrothed <S%H781><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%>, and hath not taken <S%H3947><s%> her <S%H3212><s%>? let him go and return <S%H7725><s%> unto his house <S%H1004><s%>, lest he die <S%H4191><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> take her <S%H3947><s%>.

And the officers <S%H7860><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> further <S%H3254><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, and they shall say <S%H559><s%>, What man <S%H376><s%> is there that is fearful <S%H3373><s%> and faint-hearted <S%H7390><s%>? let him go <S%H3212><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> unto his house <S%H1004><s%>, lest his brethren <S%H251><s%>'s heart <S%H3824><s%> melt <S%H4549><s%> as his heart <S%H3824><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H7860><s%>, when the officers have made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, that they shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> captains <S%H8269><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> at the head <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.
When thou drawest nigh <S%H7126><s%> unto a city <S%H5892><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against it <S%H7121><s%>, then proclaim peace unto it <S%H7965><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H6030><s%>, if it make thee answer of peace <S%H7965><s%>, and open <S%H6605><s%> unto thee <S%H5971><s%>, then it shall be, that all the people that are found <S%H4672><s%> therein shall become tributary <S%H4522><s%> unto thee <S%H5647><s%>, and shall serve thee.
And if it will make no peace <S%H7999><s%> with thee <S%H6213><s%>, but will make war <S%H4421><s%> against thee <S%H6696><s%>, then thou shalt besiege it:

and when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> delivereth <S%H5414><s%> it into thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, thou shalt smite <S%H5221><s%> every male <S%H2138><s%> thereof with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>:

but the women <S%H802><s%>, and the little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and the cattle <S%H929><s%>, and all that is in the city <S%H5892><s%>, even all the spoil <S%H7998><s%> thereof <S%H962><s%>, shalt thou take for a prey unto thyself <S%H398><s%>; and thou shalt eat the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of thine enemies <S%H341><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath given thee <S%H5414><s%>.

Thus shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> unto all the cities <S%H5892><s%> which are very <S%H3966><s%> far off <S%H7350><s%> from thee <S%H2007><s%>, which are not of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%>.

But of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of these peoples <S%H5971><s%>, that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, thou shalt save alive <S%H2421><s%> nothing that breatheth <S%H5397><s%>;

but thou shalt utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroy <S%H2763><s%> them <S%H2850><s%>: the Hittite, and the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath commanded thee <S%H6680><s%>;

that they teach <S%H3925><s%> you not to do <S%H6213><s%> after all their abominations <S%H8441><s%>, which they have done <S%H6213><s%> unto their gods <S%H430><s%>; so would ye sin <S%H2398><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

When thou shalt besiege <S%H6696><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H3117><s%>, in making war <S%H3898><s%> against it to take <S%H8610><s%> it <S%H7843><s%>, thou shalt not destroy the trees <S%H6086><s%> thereof by wielding <S%H5080><s%> an axe <S%H1631><s%> against them <S%H398><s%>; for thou mayest eat of them <S%H3772><s%>, and thou shalt not cut them down; for is the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> man <S%H120><s%>, that it should <S%H935><s%> be besieged of thee <S%H6440><s%>?

Only the trees <S%H6086><s%> of which thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> that they are not trees <S%H6086><s%> for food <S%H3978><s%>, thou shalt destroy <S%H7843><s%> and cut them down <S%H3772><s%>; and thou shalt build <S%H1129><s%> bulwarks <S%H4692><s%> against the city <S%H5892><s%> that maketh <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with thee <S%H3381><s%>, until it fall.
